body_html: Note that tf.select() does not guarantee conditional execution at all. For that please use tf.cond(pred, fn1, fn2, name=None), which is designed for this purpose. Please feel free to re-open if you can't make cond work for this purpose (which I think should work).
body_text: Note that tf.select() does not guarantee conditional execution at all.  For that please use tf.cond(pred, fn1, fn2, name=None), which is designed for this purpose.  Please feel free to re-open if you can't make cond work for this purpose (which I think should work).
body: Note that `tf.select()` does not guarantee conditional execution at all.  For that please use `tf.cond(pred, fn1, fn2, name=None)`, which is designed for this purpose.  Please feel free to re-open if you can't make `cond` work for this purpose (which I think should work).
